remarks.para: Specify a combination of the values in this enumeration in the Flags member of a structure. The values are combined by using a bitwise OR operation.

Limiting a depth-stencil buffer to read-only access allows more than one depth-stencil view to be bound to the pipeline simultaneously, since it is not possible to have read/write conflicts between separate views.

summary.para: Indicates that depth values are read only.
Indicates that stencil values are read only.
